creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
"United Airlines requesting positioning information, over."
"United Airlines 0413, flying at an altitude of 6000, a speed of 250 knots, latitude 27°32', longitude 60°34. All looks normal, over."
After a brief silence, the captain's voice started to tremble.
"Can anyone explain to me why the Orinoco Plain is now an island?"
——《UA0413 Investigation White Paper》


-Island Survival
After the plane crashed, many extraordinary events soon followed. There have been many survivors who arrived before you. They formed different pacts, fighting and sometimes working together with each other. The strange thing is that none of them seems to be trying to leave this cursed place.

-Solve Mysteries
This island is unique from the rest of the world. A rainforest, river valley, glacier, volcano, and wasteland can somehow coexist in the same region. And much evidence of lost civilizations has been found here.
None of these is normal. This island must be under some kind of power, which everyone can see, but no one wants to admit its existence.

-Build a Survival Shelter
This island is full of deadly elements. To fight for your survival, you must use primitive tools to build yourself a new home. Work with others and unite all wisdom of the survivors to produce weapons, tools, clothes, medicines, food, and other items that are essential to your survival.

-Choose Your Friends and Foes
In this fascinating world, you have many paths to choose from: You can become a builder t help others survive, an explorer to solve all mysteries, or become a fighter to meet ancient creatures on the fields of battle! The choice is yours, and you can change this choice at any time.
But rest assured, whichever path you choose, you will not be alone.

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
"United Airlines requesting positioning information, over."
"United Airlines 0413, flying at an altitude of 6000, a speed of 250 knots, latitude 27°32', longitude 60°34. All looks normal, over."
After a brief silence, the captain's voice started to tremble.
"Can anyone explain to me why the Orinoco Plain is now an island?"
——《UA0413 Investigation White Paper》


-Island Survival
After the plane crashed, many extraordinary events soon followed. There have been many survivors who arrived before you. They formed different pacts, fighting and sometimes working together with each other. The strange thing is that none of them seems to be trying to leave this cursed place.

-Solve Mysteries
This island is unique from the rest of the world. A rainforest, river valley, glacier, volcano, and wasteland can somehow coexist in the same region. And much evidence of lost civilizations has been found here.
None of these is normal. This island must be under some kind of power, which everyone can see, but no one wants to admit its existence.

-Build a Survival Shelter
This island is full of deadly elements. To fight for your survival, you must use primitive tools to build yourself a new home. Work with others and unite all wisdom of the survivors to produce weapons, tools, clothes, medicines, food, and other items that are essential to your survival.

-Choose Your Friends and Foes
In this fascinating world, you have many paths to choose from: You can become a builder t help others survive, an explorer to solve all mysteries, or become a fighter to meet ancient creatures on the fields of battle! The choice is yours, and you can change this choice at any time.
But rest assured, whichever path you choose, you will not be alone.

appDetails.developerAddress: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.63.0

Home Invasion
New Version of Home Invasion Gameplay
Event
"Limited-Time Recharge Gift" event is now available.
Companion
1. Your Companion will no longer lose HP due to exhaustion of endurance.
2. Caesar is now available in Store and Companion Recruit.
Gear
We made some changes to the Durability of gears and backpacks.
Camp
A Cooldown mechanism for switching Camp has been added. When you leave the current Camp and join another Camp, you'll need to wait at least 24 hours.

appDetails.developerAddress: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.64.0

Gear
1.Legendary Weapons and Gears are now officially available!
2.Gear Refine system has been added. Superior, Epic, and Legendary quality gears that appear in the Glacier region and the following regions can obtain additional attributes through "Gear Refine".
Companion
1.Companion-related healing items are now added to the Camp Production system.
2.A shortcut button for using Companion healing items has been created on the main screen.

"United Airlines 0413, flying at an altitude of 6000, a speed of 250 knots, latitude 27°32', longitude 60°34. All looks normal, over."
After a brief silence, the captain's voice started to tremble.
"Can anyone explain to me why the Orinoco Plain is now an island?"
——《UA0413 Investigation White Paper》


-Island Survival
After the plane crashed, many extraordinary events soon followed. There have been many survivors who arrived before you. They formed different pacts, fighting and sometimes working together with each other. The strange thing is that none of them seems to be trying to leave this cursed place.

-Solve Mysteries
This island is unique from the rest of the world. A rainforest, river valley, glacier, volcano, and wasteland can somehow coexist in the same region. And much evidence of lost civilizations has been found here.
None of these is normal. This island must be under some kind of power, which everyone can see, but no one wants to admit its existence.

-Build a Survival Shelter
This island is full of deadly elements. To fight for your survival, you must use primitive tools to build yourself a new home. Work with others and unite all wisdom of the survivors to produce weapons, tools, clothes, medicines, food, and other items that are essential to your survival.

-Choose Your Friends and Foes
In this fascinating world, you have many paths to choose from: You can become a builder t help others survive, an explorer to solve all mysteries, or become a fighter to meet ancient creatures on the fields of battle! The choice is yours, and you can change this choice at any time.
But rest assured, whichever path you choose, you will not be alone.

title: LOST Signal

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

-MULTIPLAYER

Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.70.0

Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.74 Update!

1. Christmas Event with globally participated activities and great rewards!
2. Brand new Christmas Weapons, Armors and a Firearm with exclusive appearance, special effects and attributes.

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES

Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

title: LOST in Blue (Global)

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
Captain: Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! We are encountering an extreme thunderstorm! All flight instruments dysfunctional, we are losing control!

Radio: This is Control, negative airline H380, there is no abnormal weather on your flight route, and … we just lost you on the radar.

Captain: Jesus! The lightning formed a gate… it’s opening! Ahhh!
Radio: H380, Do you copy? H380! Please respond! H380…

A passenger airplane crossing the ocean disappeared completely from radar. No one expected that, in fact the plane flew through the storm and crashed into an area cut off from the rest of the world. As a survivor, you found yourself lost in an island shrouded in mist, yet immense dangers lurk in what seems like a lucky close shave. On this lost island, basic survival challenges like overcoming hunger and thirst is merely a warm up of what’s really about to come!

-----Game Features-----
*Explore a mysterious island*
Something seems off in this mist-shrouded island, it’s almost like landscapes, structures, and things from different time and worlds are pieced together by force. Here you will discover spectacular wonders, a cemetery of shipwrecks across thousands of years, frozen tundra, blazing volcanoes, ancient temples which smell like death, and ruins from a civilization centuries ahead of our own.

*Craft various weapons*
You drifted onto this island with … nothing. In order to survive against the soulless undead and gigantic mutants, you must learn to craft various weapons, from primitive axes to sharp blades, from crude bows and arrows to sophisticated firearms. Everything has to be built from scratch, which means you must collect necessary resources including stones, pieces of wood and waste metals. Only then will you be able to survive and conquer this wretched place.

*Customize your own camps*
Hordes of monsters aren’t the only problems you need to worry about here. To survive you must deal with hunger, extreme weather or hostile wildlife, and be wary of water around here, some could be lethally poisonous. But don’t worry, See that shabby campsite over there? In due time you may turn it into a formidable base of operation or whatever you want it to be. It’s all up to you!

*Play with your friends*
You aren’t the only survivor here, many have come before you, and people have fought countless wars in order to control the limited resources. Play with your friends from all over the world, together you can choose a faction to join, customize your camps, fight against common foes or fight in the faction wars for resources and glory! Perhaps in this cruel place, you will form unbreakable friendships, and unlock the mystery that shrouded this island for thousands of years in a breathtaking adventure!

Survive, and explore what was Lost in Blue.

title: LOST in Blue (Global)

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
Captain: Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! We are encountering an extreme thunderstorm! All flight instruments dysfunctional, we are losing control!

Radio: This is Control, negative airline H380, there is no abnormal weather on your flight route, and … we just lost you on the radar.

Captain: Jesus! The lightning formed a gate… it’s opening! Ahhh!
Radio: H380, Do you copy? H380! Please respond! H380…

A passenger airplane crossing the ocean disappeared completely from radar. No one expected that, in fact the plane flew through the storm and crashed into an area cut off from the rest of the world. As a survivor, you found yourself lost in an island shrouded in mist, yet immense dangers lurk in what seems like a lucky close shave. On this lost island, basic survival challenges like overcoming hunger and thirst is merely a warm up of what’s really about to come!

-----Game Features-----
*Explore a mysterious island*
Something seems off in this mist-shrouded island, it’s almost like landscapes, structures, and things from different time and worlds are pieced together by force. Here you will discover spectacular wonders, a cemetery of shipwrecks across thousands of years, frozen tundra, blazing volcanoes, ancient temples which smell like death, and ruins from a civilization centuries ahead of our own.

*Craft various weapons*
You drifted onto this island with … nothing. In order to survive against the soulless undead and gigantic mutants, you must learn to craft various weapons, from primitive axes to sharp blades, from crude bows and arrows to sophisticated firearms. Everything has to be built from scratch, which means you must collect necessary resources including stones, pieces of wood and waste metals. Only then will you be able to survive and conquer this wretched place.

*Customize your own camps*
Hordes of monsters aren’t the only problems you need to worry about here. To survive you must deal with hunger, extreme weather or hostile wildlife, and be wary of water around here, some could be lethally poisonous. But don’t worry, See that shabby campsite over there? In due time you may turn it into a formidable base of operation or whatever you want it to be. It’s all up to you!

*Play with your friends*
You aren’t the only survivor here, many have come before you, and people have fought countless wars in order to control the limited resources. Play with your friends from all over the world, together you can choose a faction to join, customize your camps, fight against common foes or fight in the faction wars for resources and glory! Perhaps in this cruel place, you will form unbreakable friendships, and unlock the mystery that shrouded this island for thousands of years in a breathtaking adventure!

Survive, and explore what was Lost in Blue.

title: LOST in Blue (Global)

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

appDetails.developerAddress: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.90 Update!

1. Survival Training is now available as a new feature. Build the Training Station in your Home Camp to get started.
2. Total Invasion is now live as a limited-time Home Invasion variant.
3. Island Guide is added to improve player experience.
4. The size for Home Camps are significantly expanded.
5. Various new items, including a new firearm weapon, are added to the Shop.
6. The legendary skin Pink Rabbit will soon be available in the Fortune Wheel.

title: LOST in BLUE

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
descriptionShort: Stay alive while exploring the island, and find opportunities to be rescued

title: LOST in BLUE

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
descriptionShort: Stay alive while exploring the island, and find opportunities to be rescued

Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
descriptionShort: Stay alive while exploring the island, and find opportunities to be rescued

title: LOST in BLUE

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
descriptionShort: Stay alive while exploring the island, and find opportunities to be rescued

appDetails.developerAddress: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.138.0 Update

1. Added new mounts including Bionic Submarine, Alien Aircraft, and Hovercar.
2. Added new skin sets including Assassin's Set, Astral Traveler Set, and Historical Korean Set, as well as new wraparound effects including Desert Glory and Golden Barrier.
3. You can now support camps in Island Conquest to grant them Support Points.
4. Optimized gameplay mechanics in Campsite Bonfire event.

appDetails.developerAddress: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Version 1.140.0 Update

1. You can now view the info of other players.
2. Revamped Camp Quests and added items & rewards to the Camp system.
3. Improved performance and solved some memory leak issues.
4. Added passive skills available at Survivor Lv. 50 to provide combat bonuses.
5. Added higher-level challenges to Monster Invasion.

After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
descriptionShort: Stay alive while exploring the island, and find opportunities to be rescued

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

title:

1.58.1

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?

LOST in BLUE
1.180.1

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
descriptionShort: Stay alive while exploring the island, and find opportunities to be rescued

The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
descriptionShort: Stay alive while exploring the island, and find opportunities to be rescued

title:
LOST in BLUE
1.230.0

container.value: 9/F.,MW Tower, NO.111 Bonham Strand Sheung Wan, Hong Kong

creator: Volcano Force
descriptionHtml:
After surviving a plane crash, you must collect resources to craft weapons and tools, build facilities and houses to withstand the elements of this strange island. Battle through various natural environments like fiery volcanoes, freezing glaciers, etc. and difficult obstacles such as mutant zombies, militias, wild creatures, etc. Do everything you can to get yourself home.


Game Features:
-MULTIPLAYER
To Survive on this mysterious deserted island, you must form friendships with players from around the world and gather the limited resources.

-CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT
Upgrade your character to stay alive and experience the excitement of what mother nature has to offer to its fullest.

-A UNIQUE ISLAND
The PVE part of this game is unlike any others. Survive and explore natural sceneries like beaches, tropical rainforests, swamps, and volcanoes. At the same time, you are battling your way through man-made obstacles, such as an expedition ship from the 1980s, many secret research labs, ancient underground ruins, and deadly abandoned temples.

-LEARN TO CRAFT AND BUILD
Collect materials and use them to build your own camp! Learn to craft various types of tools and weapons. You will need them to survive! Build your own unique camp with defensive facilities such as sensory tower, arrow tower, etc. and survival facilities like vegetable patches, where you plant seeds and grow food, or workbenches, where you make tools for hunting or gathering!

-PVP OR PVE
It's your choice! Whether to fight or work with other players!

-GO ON EXCITING ADVENTURES
This game was developed to provide players with the Ultimate experience of surviving on a deserted island. The PVE and PVP elements are something you can never find in any other game!

Can you survive this island and get yourself home?
